sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
He and [[Goldcloak 2 (The Wolf and the Lion)|his partner]] stop [[Arya Stark]] at the entrance of the [[Red Keep]] but back down when she reveals her parentage.<ref>"[[The Wolf and the Lion]]"</ref>
